laboratory_examinations.findings: No microsatellite instability detected; loss of heterozygosity of p53 and APC genes detected.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Computed Tomographic and Positron-Emission Tomographic Scans
laboratory_examinations.findings: Focus of intense tracer uptake in the cecal region; multiple small omental soft-tissue nodules without 18F-FDG avidity; small volume of ascites in pelvis; several small low-level tracer uptake pulmonary nodules.
